title: Harmony Hotel Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Costa Rican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The open-air main restaurant of the hotel uses fresh local ingredients whenever possible and works with sustainable producers, plus sources produce from own nearby farm. Offers several vegan and vegetarian dishes and staff and chef are happy to veganize any dish. This is a separate restaurant and kitchen from the Harmony Hotel Juice Bar, although they are on the same property.
